name: DailyChallenge
0:
”Alexa open daily challenge”
”Alexa start daily challenge”
”Alexa tell daily challenge to skip”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily challenge
des:
Improve your life step by step with over 300 little challenges. You won't get bored with challenges helping you getting out of your comfort zone.

You can say 'start daily challenge'to repeat your daily challenge or say 'Tell daily challenge to skip' for getting a new challenge.

You can say 'cancel' or 'stop' at any time to close the skill.

If you need help you can say 'help'.

If you want to submit new challenge ideas send an email to info@smeech.de

Feedback is greatly appriciated.

Icons made by https://www.flaticon.com/authors/freepik from https://www.flaticon.com is licensed by http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
